aboutOne.title: We are the Next-Gen
aboutOne.subTitle: Higher EdTech Platform
aboutOne.desc: Vidyarishi (a program initiated by Rishikesh Education Services Pvt. Ltd.) transforms education by making high-quality learning accessible. With expert-led courses, advanced technology, and industry collaborations, we equip learners with essential skills to bridge the gap between knowledge and opportunity, empowering career success.
aboutOne.desc1: Vidyarishi is committed to transforming education by making high-quality learning accessible to all. Through expert-led courses, advanced technology, and industry collaborations, we equip learners with the skills needed to excel in their careers. Our mission is to bridge the gap between knowledge and opportunity, empowering individuals to achieve professional success with confidence.
aboutOne.desc2: Our mission is to make quality education accessible to all, breaking barriers and redefining professional growth. By blending innovation with a learner-centric approach, VidyaRishi ensures a transformative learning experience that prepares individuals for success in their careers and beyond.

children.title: Our Purpose
children.info: To empower individuals with transformative learning experiences that shape their future success, bridging the gap between knowledge and opportunity!

children.title: Our Promise
children.info: To provide expert-led, industry-aligned education that equips learners with the practical skills needed to excel in the modern world!

children.title: Our Focus
children.info: We focus on providing industry-relevant education, innovative teaching, and personalized learning to equip learners with the skills needed for career success.
